title: SIXTEEN SUCCESS FACTORS
description: KEY SKILLS AND PERSPECTIVES FOR MANAGEMENT EFFECTIVENESS

factors.name: RESOURCEFULNESS
factors.description: Knows how to adapt to changing and often ambiguous circumstances; can both think strategically and make good decisions under pressure; can set up complex work systems and engage in flexible problem-solving behavior; can work effectively with higher management in dealing with the complexities of the management job.

factors.name: DOING WHATEVER IT TAKES
factors.description: Has perseverance and focus in the face of obstacles; takes charge, knows what is needed, and moves forward; is capable of standing alone yet is open to learning from others when necessary.

factors.name: BEING A QUICK STUDY
factors.description: Quickly learns new management and technical skills.

factors.name: DECISIVENESS
factors.description: Prefers quick and approximate actions to slow and precise ones in many management situations.

factors.name: LEADING SUBORDINATES
factors.description: Delegates to subordinates effectively, broadens subordinates' opportunities, and acts with fairness toward subordinates.

factors.name: SETTING A DEVELOPMENTAL CLIMATE
factors.description: Provides a challenging climate to encourage subordinates' development.

factors.name: CONFRONTING PROBLEM SUBORDINATES
factors.description: Acts decisively and with fairness when dealing with problem subordinates.

factors.name: TEAM ORIENTATION
factors.description: Doesn't have to do it all alone; accomplishes tasks through managing others.

factors.name: BUILDING AND MENDING RELATIONSHIPS
factors.description: Knows how to build and maintain working relationships with co-workers and external parties; can negotiate and handle work problems without alienating people; understands others and is able to get their cooperation in non-authority relationships.

factors.name: COMPASSION AND SENSITIVITY
factors.description: Shows genuine interest in others and sensitivity to subordinates' needs.

factors.name: STRAIGHTFORWARDNESS AND COMPOSURE
factors.description: Is steadfast, relies on fact-based positions, doesn't blame others for mistakes, and is able to recover from troubled situations.

factors.name: BALANCE BETWEEN PERSONAL LIFE AND WORK
factors.description: Balances work priorities with personal life so that neither is neglected.

factors.name: SELF-AWARENESS
factors.description: Has an accurate picture of strengths and weaknesses and is willing to improve.

factors.name: PUTTING PEOPLE AT EASE
factors.description: Displays warmth and a good sense of humor.

factors.name: ACTING WITH FLEXIBILITY
factors.description: Can behave in ways that are often seen as flexible.
